# Content Guide

## Front matter template
```yaml
---
title: "Page Title"
order: 1
layout: "base"
eleventyNavigation:
  key: "Page Title"
  order: 1
---
```

## Images
- Place image files in `content/img/`.
- Reference them as `/img/filename.ext` in Markdown:
  ```md
  ![Alt text](/img/example.jpg)
  ```

## Writing style
- Keep headings concise.
- Prefer short paragraphs and clear lists.
